Name: Royalist Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of peach wedge on rim.
Review: A Manhattan-style cocktail but with dry vermouth and considerably more of it, Bénédictine and peach bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by William James "Billy" Tarling and featured in his 1937 The Café Royal Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Royalist Cocktail contains 201 calories
